title.narrative: Increasing tolerance in selected municipalities to promote social cohesion in Kyrgyzstan

description.narrative:
Specific objective 1 Greater understanding among religious officials of their roles and legal mandate and increased capacity to mediate and refer community concerns and disputes appropriately Outcomes 1.1 Focus groups with LSGs and local community members have been conducted in 6 rayons 1.2 KIIs with imams and local civil society representatives have been conducted 1.3 Training methodology has been finalised 1.4 Training has been delivered to religious leaders 1.5 Final report and recommendations have been disseminated to the donor and the Government of the Kyrgyz Republic
Specific objective 2 LSGs and religious officials have been able to identify and solve local issues together in a conflict-sensitive manner and in line with the secular constitution Outcomes 2.1 Advocacy meetings between LSGs and imams have been conducted 2.2 Small grants for action plans have been disbursed to teams in each locality 2.3 Community awareness briefings held in 4 rayons 2.4 Follow-up focus groups with LSGs and local community members have been conducted in 6 rayons 2.5 Follow-up interviews with religious leaders and local civil society representatives have been conducted 2.6 Final presentation event have been held in Osh and Tokmok
State Commission for Religious Affairs local self-government bodies local NGOs

The project “Increasing Tolerance in Selected Municipalities to Increase Social Cohesion in Kyrgyzstan” aims to create a dialogue platform between local governments, representatives of different confessions and civil society, in order to ensure equal opportunities for development, cooperation and reduce conflict potential in society. Within the framework of the pilot project, International Alert plans to increase the capacity of representatives of local governments, religious leaders of various confessions and civil society in mediation and conflict analysis skills, joint identification and solution of social problems at the local level under the Constitution and legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.
